ISSUE.TITLE: 0.3 Private variables not set on PR build
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hey, I was testing the 0.3 build and found that, when building a PR the private variables are not set. I configured them in the project settings: ``` ONE=bar TWO=foo ``` Any ideas what can be wrong? Greetings, Ralf

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Update Monaco lib / Fix Git Blame font (#417)
